bio: Listens-to-Letters lives in Solitude, the provincial capital of Skyrim. He is a male Argonian. He has a stand in the marketplace, at which he sells books. He usually wears mage robes with apprentice-level magicka-boosting enchantments. He sleeps at the Imperial Alehouse, a lodging facility at which several other merchants also spend the night.
name: Listens-to-Letters
